extendedInfo.description: Fly Willow the Whale through the magical skies of Rainbow Land!Collect Blubbles, loop the loop, smash grumpy Thunder Bros and meet friends along the way.Choose how you want to play: sit back and explore endless Classic Mode or unlock stars in bite-size Challenge Levels.Featuresâ¢ Soundtrack by Gruff Rhys of âThe Super Furry Animalsâ â¢ Simple and intuitive one touch gameplay â¢ 2 game modes, Classic and Challenge â¢ 2 Challenge Packs with 64 levels, can you 3 STAR them all? â¢ Go wild smashing the Thunder Bros in 'Frenzy' mode â¢ Launch into space at super speed with Hyper-Boost power-ups â¢ Smash clouds with Cloud Mine power-up â¢ Suck up Blubbles with Blubble Magnet power-up â¢ Compete against friends with Scoreloop â¢ 64 achievements to unlock, testing your skills to the MAXHow to playâ¢ Press and hold anywhere on the screen to make Willow swoop upwardsâ¢ Release your finger from the screen to make Willow dive downwardsâ¢ Press and hold to make Willow perform a loop the loop, useful when collecting hard to reach Blubbles

reviews.title: Ok game
reviews.comment: Its not all that its cracked up to be I thoght it would be the one where you do chlenges and earn money but its not and it cost way to much money I a not a fan.
reviews.author: Colton Anderson

reviews.title: Playing on newer phone...
reviews.comment: I recently upgraded my phone to the new galaxy s4 and after the logo screen the game shuts off...it worked fine on my old galaxy s1 :( I love this game and want to be able to play it again.I\'ll 5 star once this game will run :)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Frenzy
reviews.comment: I agree frenzy is much better. I did not want all the adware on my phone frm the commercials so I bought this one but it is boring. How about frenzy without commercials since I have already paid for commercial free game.
reviews.author: Danna Rae

reviews.title: Ok but frenzy is better
reviews.comment: This is the paid version which I bought after playing whale trail frenzy. Like the challenges but the frenzy version is better. A combination of frenzy and classic would be the perfect game and I would pay for it.
reviews.author: Tera Dildine

reviews.title: Crashes on nexus 4 and 7.
reviews.comment: I\'m unable to run this game on my nexus devices. Please update this game.
reviews.author: Wendy Wang

reviews.title: does not work
reviews.comment: i loved this game before on my S1 but after upgrading to HTC One it does not work anymore
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Bad update
reviews.comment: Sound works but it gives me a black screen. Unable to play at all. Please fix this.
reviews.author: yun sin

reviews.title: Not working
reviews.comment: on S4 the game shows the logo then crashes. Fix pls
reviews.author: hachi9992jrn

reviews.title: STILL Doesn\'t work on Oppo Find 5
reviews.comment: Try using it on the latest RC2 of cyanogenmod. Opens and closes immediately. It\'s a super popular mod and imho should be supported.   I\'ll try to get my money back.
reviews.author: Rob S\303\240nchez

reviews.title: Dumb
reviews.comment: Wtf. I have a sony Ericsson and when i try to play it it turns off and so i can\'t even play it stuped
reviews.author: Calieb Enas

reviews.comment: 16Jul - Unfortunate that it seems support for this game may have stopped. Finally started working well on Nexus 4 but cannot get past loading screen on Nexus 7. Must be force closed.\tNeeds N4 fix but otherwise amazing.  03JUN - Still waiting on Nexus 4 fix.
reviews.author: Mark Wong-Ken

reviews.title: AMAZING
reviews.comment: This game ROCKS!! Bright colors, catchy soundtrack, very well done :D playing this game just makes me happy :)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Help please
reviews.comment: I\'ve always loved this game and I bought it to enjoy it on my Nexus 4 running 4.2.2.  Both the classic and frenzy have black lines in the game.  I fixed the issue in frenzy by going to the advanced setting menu and unchecking a setting I read in another comment.  I\'m trying to find the settings menu in Whale Trail Classic, where is it!?!
reviews.author: Preetham Kyanam

reviews.title: Fixed! Thanks Dev!
reviews.comment: Thanks for fixing the problem with Jellybean! No riots in the sky, just a riot of colors!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great game but...
reviews.comment: When I play ok my Motorola Electrify M, parts of the game freeze in stripes, even with the new update. Love the game though!
reviews.author: Jake Pardue

reviews.title: Keeps not responding
reviews.comment: When I try to play sometimes the game won\'t recognize me tapping on the screen and I either run into clouds or die. Pretty annoying
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Whaley good
reviews.comment: Really enjoyed this game. Is a bit buggy on my Nexus 4 but fine on our Asus Transformer. Plus Gruff Rhys is god. When are SFA getting back together?
reviews.author: Rob Lucas

reviews.title: Decent
reviews.comment: I like the game and all but it seems exactly like frenzy only it costs 3 dollars. Honestly I did pay for no ads on frenzy but that was because it was spamming me with them. But $3 for a game almost exactly like it bugs me because it doesn\'t seem like its entirely better.
reviews.author: Jessica Simo

reviews.title: This game is amazing.
reviews.comment: I don\'t know how or why, but for the few moments I\'ve got my headphones on, everything in the world seems good haha! It just puts you in a good mood!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: It\'s a rely great game but should have a shop like whail trail frenzy
reviews.author: Sean Thomas
